Chinese Ribs¶

Ingredients¶

  • 4 pounds pork spareribs
  • 1/2 cup honey
  • 1/4 cup soy sauce
  • 1/4 cup distilled white vinegar
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 2 tablespoons brown sugar

Method¶

  1. Remove skin from back of ribs
  2. Season ribs with salt and pepper
  3. Steam the ribs wrapped in foil in a steamer for 2 hours, rotating them every hour
  4. Combine the honey, soy sauce, vinegar, garlic and brown sugar. Stir until honey and sugar are completely dissolved.
  5. Marinate the ribs overnight with the source
  6. Pour the marinate into a saucepan and reduce by half
  7. Baste the ribs with the sauce and then re-heat for about 20 minutes on the grill
